Package controller

The controller of the application.
Here are the view controllers:
  • ApplicationCtrl.java
  • ConnectionCtrl.java
  • RegisterCtrl.java
  • Training.java

And here are the action controllers :
  • Use in the project
  • ChangeMarkCtrl.java
  • ExerciseDataListCtrl.java
  • ExerciseListCtrl.java
  • SerieInputCtrl.java
  • SerieLabelCtrl.java
  • TrainingComponentListCtrl.java
  • TrainingListCtrl.java
  • Not use in the project
  • ExerciseDetailsCtrl.java
  • PreviousExerciseListCtrl.java
  • TrainingDetailsCtrl.java

For the details of utilisation of the Class refer to view controllers.
The view directly point to ConnectionCtrl.java to make the user connect himself.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ApplicationCtrl
    The main scene of the application.
    ChangeMarkCtrl
    ChangeMark action controller.
    ConnectionCtrl
    View controller to connect the user
    ExerciseDataListCtrl
    For the third page of the main scene.
    ExerciseDetailsCtrl
    For the first page of the main scene.
    ExerciseListCtrl
    For the first page of the main scene.
    PreviousExerciseListCtrl
    For the second scene of the application.
    PreviousTrainingTreeCtrl
    Represents the tree in the second page of the application.
    RegisterCtrl
    Make the user register him self.
    SerieInputCtrl
    For the training view.
    SerieLabelCtrl
    Name of the serie for the training scene.
    SerieListCtrl
    For the main scene.
    TrainingComponentListCtrl
    For the main scene.
    TrainingCtrl
    The training scene
    The scene make a loop around every training component and for earch serie in them he show the weight and the number of repetition the user have to make.
    TrainingDetailsCtrl
    Details of the training (not use yet).
    TrainingListCtrl
    The training list controller.
